text: was a Vice-Admiral in the Imperial Japanese Navy during World War II, who came to known as the father of the kamikaze. ==Other websites== * One of the commanders who be orderd the Kamikaze operation (in Japanese) * * * * Category:1891 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Japanese admirals Category:Aviators Category:Military personnel of World War II Category:People from Hyōgo Prefecture
title: Takijirō Ōnishi
